channel.title: World
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from World, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘Almost 100,000’ documents could be linked to Mandelson’s appointment as ambassador - UK politics live
item.description: Pressure continues to build on Keir Starmer and chief of staff Morgan McSweeney over decision to appoint Peter Mandelson despite friendship with Jeffr...

item.title: UK could ‘lose generation of scientists’ with cuts to projects and research facilities
item.description: UK’s research funding body warned best scientists taking posts oversees due to lack of job stability at home Hundreds of early career researchers have...

item.title: Russia blames Ukraine for attempted assassination of top general – as it happened
item.description: This blog is now closed, you can read more on this story here Hundreds of protesters gathered in Milan on Friday to oppose the presence of US Immigrat...

item.title: ‘A stain on our history’: outrage after Trump shares racist video about Obamas as White House attempts to brush off the post – live
item.description: Former Obama adviser Ben Rhodes slams Trump for posting racist video on Truth Social; Karoline Leavitt says criticism is ‘fake outrage’ Trump shares v...

item.title: Levi’s sales grow in UK as celebrities drive denim revival
item.description: Noel Gallagher and Harry Styles lead way, and sales of jeans in general rise faster than wider fashion market The UK was one of Levi’s fastest-growing...

item.title: Iranian foreign minister says US talks in Oman a 'good beginning'
item.description: Abbas Aragchi says there will be consultations, after hours of talks end in Muscat, which both sides entered with significantly different positions.

item.title: Selfies with Snoop as GB curlers remain unbeaten
item.description: Team GB maintain their 100% record in the Winter Olympics mixed doubles with victories over Sweden and South Korea.

item.title: Masculinity and vulnerability aren't exclusive, says Bafta-nominated director
item.description: Film-maker Akinola Davies Jr says he wanted to explore the depiction of father-son relationships.

item.title: Millions of documents - but Epstein's victims say they are no closer to justice
item.description: One campaigner says the files are "symptomatic of a broken system of how we treat women - how we view survivors".

item.title: Head of firm founded by Mandelson to quit
item.description: Benjamin Wegg-Prosser concluded his association with Lord Mandelson - and references to them both in the Epstein files - was doing the business Global...
